TITLE.P: Advanced metering and control system (AMS) for Midtkraft Nett AS - Pre-qualification

SHORT_DESCR.P: Advanced meter and control systems shall be built to measure electric energy consumption (AMS) for all of MKN’s network customers, cf. Regulation for measurement, settlement and coordinated conduct for power sales and invoicing of network services (the Settlement Regulation). In addition, network benefits including earth fault monitoring shall be established for all of MKN’s low voltage sub stations.
The delivery will therefore consist of the following:
— delivery of meters to all of MKN’s network customers (approx. 14 000),
— delivery and installation of collection system for meter values, including integration with the existing related systems (customer information system etc.),
— delivery of communication between the meters and the collection system,
— booking and installation of meters at MKN’s network customers,
— delivery of network benefits including earth fault monitoring to all of MKN’s low voltage sub stations (up to 800).

TITLE.P: Advanced metering and control systems (AMS) for Midtkraft Nett AS — Delivery of equipment and software

SHORT_DESCR.P: Advanced meter and control systems shall be built to measure electric energy consumption (AMS) for all of MKN’s network customers, cf. Regulation for measurement, settlement and coordinated conduct for power sales and invoicing of network services (the Settlement Regulation). In addition, network benefits including earth fault monitoring shall be established for all of MKN’s low voltage sub stations.
The delivery will therefore consist of the following:
— delivery of meters to all of MKN’s network customers (approx. 14 000),
— delivery and installation of collection system for meter values, including integration with the existing related systems (customer information system etc.),
— delivery of communication between the meters and the collection system,
— booking and installation of meters at MKN’s network customers,
— delivery of network benefits including earth fault monitoring to all of MKN’s low voltage sub stations (up to 800).

The delivery will involve a “full roll-out of AMS”, and it is desirable for the contracting authority to have only one contracting party. However, it is possible to submit tender offers on parts of the assignment.
Division of the assignment is defined as follows:
Lot 1 (this lot):
— delivery of meters and communications solution to MKN’s network customers,
— delivery and installation of collection system for meter values,
— delivery of network benefit including earth fault monitoring to all of MKN’s low voltage sub stations.
Lot 2:
— booking and installation of meters at MKN’s network customers.
It is not possible to submit tender offers on parts of the assignment that do not follow this division, or further division.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: Further purchasing of equipment as needed after the roll-out of the AMS is completed.

CRITERIA_CANDIDATE.P: See the separate attached qualification documentation with comprehensive information.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: Operation of the meter values collection system.

TITLE.P: Advanced metering and control system (AMS) for Midtkraft Nett AS — Installation of meters

SHORT_DESCR.P: Advanced meter and control systems shall be built to measure electric energy consumption (AMS) for all of MKN’s network customers, cf. Regulation for measurement, settlement and coordinated conduct for power sales and invoicing of network services (the settlement regulation). In addition, network benefits including earth fault monitoring shall be established for all of MKN’s low voltage sub stations.

CRITERIA_CANDIDATE.P: See the separate attached qualification documentation with comprehensive information.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: Operation of the meter values collection system.

SUITABILITY.P: — Foreign companies: Proof that the company is registered in a trade index or business register as prescribed by the law of the country where the tenderer is established.
— Foreign tenderers must submit certificates from authorities equivalent to the Norwegian authorities.
— The certificates shall not be older than 6 months.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_INFO.P: — The company's auditor certified annual financial statements for the last 3 year fiscal years including nots, the board’s Annual Reports, as well as newer information of relevance to the company’s fiscal figures.
— Statement of the company's turnover in recent years, with relevance to this contract.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: — Overview of equivalent implemented assignments, including description of the assignments, value /scope, dates, name of customer and the contact person at the customer. The contracting authority shall be given full authority to contact the person concerned.

— Confirmation that the tenderer's equipment, software and other solutions satisfy all requirements set in the Settlement Regulation (Regulation for metering, settlement and coordinated conduct for power sales and invoicing of network services).

— Statement regarding the tenderer's average workforce during the last 3 years, and for the equipment, machinery, tools, materials or technical equipment that the tenderer has at their disposal for the implementation of the contract /assignment.
— Statement regarding the tenderer's quality assurance system /quality management system, or a copy of the system certificate issued by accredited certification bodies or equivalent documentation.

— The tenderer shall provide a statement about their environmental management system. If this is described in the company's quality - or environmental management system in accordance with ISO 9001, ISO 14001, or equivalent third- party verified systems, the submission of a valid certificate will suffice.
— The tenderer shall provide a statement about their own ethical guidelines.
— Confirmation that software developers located outside of the EU will not have access to personal information. Cf. GDPR legislation.
— Confirmation of presence in Norway with a description of competence, capacity and location in Norway.
